title: SLEEPERS FOR CURVES LESS THAN 350M WITH IT’S GAUGE WIDENING SLEEPER SETS
description: Concrete Class B40 Sleeper Length 2700 Type of Rail R-65 and R-50 Nominal maximum weight of sleeper 319 kg Outer to outer shoulder spacing to produce nominal track gauge of 1435 mm, assuming all parts nominal size and rail in contact with outer insulator, see Pandrol drawing. Design: Sleepers designed to withstand 25 Tonne Axle Load - 160 Km/h Spacing 0.543m Volume of sleeper 0.128 m^3’ Freeze resistant F200

title: PRE-STRESSED CONCRETE SLEEPERS
description: High-strength pre-stressed concrete designed to endure significant load and environmental conditions. Suitable for high-speed rail and heavy load bearing.

title: CONCRETE PILES
description: Concrete piles for deep foundation solutions, ensuring stability and durability in various soil conditions. Optimized for both commercial and residential buildings.

title: REINFORCED CONCRETE BRIDGES
description: Engineered reinforced concrete bridges that meet modern standards for safety and longevity. Ideal for both urban and rural infrastructure projects.

description: Concrete crossings designed for durability and safety, providing a stable and long-lasting solution for road and rail intersections.

title: RAILWAY SLEEPERS FOR HIGH-SPEED LINES
description: High-performance railway sleepers designed specifically for high-speed rail lines. Ensuring safety and stability at high speeds.

title: CONCRETE SEGMENTS FOR TUNNELS
description: Durable concrete segments used in the construction of tunnels, providing structural integrity and longevity.

description: High-quality precast concrete panels for quick and efficient construction of buildings and other structures.

description: Durable concrete culverts for efficient drainage and water flow management in various infrastructure projects.
